sentences.en: Books are the nourishment of scholars.
Can plants obtain adequate nourishment from such poor soil?
sentences.cn: 土壤这样贫瘠，植物能获得足够的养分吗？

sentences.en: Contain abundant vitamin, amino acids, begonia grass, bone collagen etc. nourishment composition.
sentences.cn: 含丰富维生 、 氨基酸 、 海棠草 、 骨胶原蛋白等营养成份.

sentences.en: He devoted himself to the nourishment of education.
sentences.cn: 他献身于发展教育事业.

sentences.en: He ventured that plants draw part of their nourishment from the air.
sentences.cn: 他大胆提出植物从空气中吸收部分养分的观点。

sentences.en: He was unable to take nourishment for several days.
sentences.cn: 他有几天不能吃东西了。

sentences.en: His favorite fruits and vegetables as well as 55 lb. of bamboo will be on board for nourishment.
sentences.cn: 除了它最喜爱的水果和蔬菜以外还有55磅的竹子将会作为它在飞机上的食物。

sentences.en: I don't extract nourishment from the blood passing through my four chambers.
sentences.cn: 我并不从流经我那四个腔的血中吸取营养.

sentences.en: I shall never forget the tactful patience with which he persuaded him to take nourishment.
sentences.cn: 我什么时候也忘不了他劝说他增加营养的那种耐心和手腕.

sentences.en: Lack of proper nourishment reduces their power to resist disease.
sentences.cn: 营养不良降低了他们抵抗疾病的能力.

sentences.en: Plants get nourishment from the soil.
sentences.cn: 植物从土壤中吸取营养.

sentences.en: Sugar gives quick relief to hunger but provides no lasting nourishment.
sentences.cn: 糖能快速缓解饥饿感，但不能提供持久的营养。

sentences.en: The mother provides the embryo with nourishment and a place to grow.
sentences.cn: 母亲为胎儿提供营养和成长的空间。

sentences.en: The patient is able to sit up and take nourishment now.
sentences.cn: 病人现在已经能够坐起来吃东西了.

sentences.en: The roots are the underground parts of the tree that supply it with nourishment.
sentences.cn: 树根是树的地下部分,用于供应养分.

sentences.en: The soil provides nourishment for plant roots.
sentences.cn: 土壤为植物根部提供养分。

sentences.en: To help provide essential nourishment, we've put together these nutritious drinks.
sentences.cn: 为了帮助提供必要的营养，我们调配了这些营养饮料。

trans.tran_cn: 食物，滋养品，营养品，“nourish”的派生
trans.tran_en: the food and other substances that people and other living things need to live, grow, and stay healthy
